content: The PR adding the aarch64-apple-darwin target has been r+. Once it lands, what should my steps be to get it into the bootstrapping compiler? I think @simulacrum mentioned something about a beta backport being required?
Yeah the PR adding the target probably just needs a beta nominated label and compiler can approve (or not, I guess) the PR.
Once it's in beta we just bump the bootstrap compiler which is easy
Ok; shall I add that label once it lands (to avoid any churn from it causing some unforeseen issue)
Yeah, or now is fine too. Doesn't matter much.
@simulacrum what's the general process after it's tagged? The team looks at nominations at the next meeting?
Which reminds me I need to do a round of backports...
